alert.note: Alert for North Bay Interior Valleys; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued October 30 at 6:46AM PDT until October 30 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Lowered visibility this morning due to foggy conditions. Visibilities are oscillating around 2 miles of visibility or less with areas of dense fog at one quarter mile or less. * WHERE...North Bay Interior Valleys (especially between Petaluma to Santa Rosa and around Napa) and Southern Monterey Bay (including Castroville, Salinas, Monterey, Pacific Grove, Carmel). * WHEN...Until 9 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. Note that you may suddenly come upon dense fog while driving which will rapidly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: North Bay Interior Valleys; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast
